name: Locked in the dragon's dungeon
description:
Made for the Monthly Jam #4 (But in two days because I joined late and then had my time cut short), with the theme of 'Locked'.

You wake up in a dungeon next to a locked door. Fight your way through slimes and bats, collect gold, and find a key to get the next level of the dungeon. But be careful, if your HP reaches 0, you get brought back to the start of the dungeon. After each level you can select a potion to drink, which will boost your stats, but choose wisely.

Controls:
Movement - Arrow Keys
Attack - Swing your mouse around and hope for the best
Select - Left Mouse Button

Dungeon Layouts Generated with: https://watabou.itch.io/one-page-dungeon

Disclaimer:
You may get the same dungeon layout twice in a row. This is because making the layouts takes a long time and is quite boring, plus procedural generation wasn't working with my tileset. If this happens to you, then I apologize. I like the direction this game is going though, so i might come back and add more layouts at a later stage.

(Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com)
